definition: animal hide/leather/to reform/to remove/to expel (from office)
animal hide/leather/to reform/to remove/to expel (from office)
to reform and open to the outside world/refers to Deng Xiaoping's policies from around 1980
Cultural Revolution (1966-76)/abbr. for 文化大革命[Wen2 hua4 Da4 ge2 ming4]
Xinhai Revolution (1911), which ended the Qing Dynasty

sentences.english: If it used with various retanning agents, the fullness of leather was good.
sentences.chinese: 若与多种复鞣材料搭配使用，亦可制得丰满坚实的革。

sentences.english: Viscoelastic behavior of polymer polisher is a key to polishing precision and quality, it changes with the time, temperture and polishing compound property during polishing process.
sentences.chinese: 粘弹性行为是决定合成抛光革抛光性能的重要因素。

sentences.english: The processing techniques and key technical points for making buffalo nubuck upholstery were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了水牛磨砂沙发革的加工工艺及技术措施。

sentences.english: And on the second day after he had killed Godolias, no man yet knowing it.
sentences.chinese: 革达里雅被害后第二天，人尚一无所知。

sentences.english: In this paper, the manufacturing processes of washable upper leather has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究耐水洗鞋面革的加工过程。

sentences.english: In this paper, the technology key and measures processing pigskin waterproof shoe lining leather were expounded.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述了猪皮防水鞋里革加工的技术关键与措施。

sentences.english: This paper studied the making of high—grade case leather from the pigskins in east region of Sichuan.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了如何利用川东地区猪皮制造高档箱包革。

sentences.english: Yes, but my wife Grete must come along too.
sentences.chinese: 噢，可以，可是我的老婆，革里特也必须去。

sentences.english: The uppers of this pair of shoes are made of horse hide and the rest is leather.
sentences.chinese: 这双鞋子的鞋面是马皮的，其它部分都是革的。

sentences.english: The flammability of leather was evaluated by the vertical flame test and Oxygen Index Test.
sentences.chinese: 革的燃烧性能用垂直燃烧试验和氧指数进行表征。

sentences.english: A processing technique for cattle nubuck upper leather was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一个牛磨砂鞋面革加工工艺。

sentences.english: The character and application of suede sole splits from cattle hide were simply introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文简要介绍了牛二层细绒鞋面革的特征与用途。

sentences.english: Finished with Italian Leather or aniline leather upholstery and strapping.
sentences.chinese: 完成与意大利皮革或苯胺革椅垫和魁梧。

sentences.english: The method of finishing of the cobweb cracked effect leather in the condition high temperature was studied.
sentences.chinese: 系统地研究了高温蜘蛛网龟裂效应革涂饰方法。

sentences.english: And there appeared in the cherubims the likeness of a man's hand under their wings.
sentences.chinese: 我看见革鲁宾在翅膀下的手好像人手。

definition: to ward off (a blow)/to withstand/to defend
to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself
"blade of grass" component in Chinese characters
one-legged mountain demon of Chinese mythology/Chinese mythical figure who invented music and dancing/Chinese rain god/surname Kui
to ward off (a blow)/to withstand/to defend
